item.title: Train-Validation-Test split in PyTorch
item.description: Abstract PyTorch is great! It offers tons of utilities that make every ML project a little bit less daunting. It’s easy to have your DNN-model up and running in almost no time. At the same time, the framework is still relatively unopinionated and lets you decide on the exact structure of your project. I’ve been playing around with PyTorch recently and the one thing I’ve been missing so far is to be able to create a train-validation-test split of my data in an “out of the box” manner.
